original_text: All the other soldiers in the Philistine army then became very afraid. This included the soldiers in the camp, those in the fields, those who were guards, and the groups who were attacking other towns. Even the ground shook because God had made them all very afraid.
korean_text: 들에 있는 진영과 모든 백성들이 공포에 떨었고 부대와 노략꾼들도 떨었으며 땅도 진동하였으니 이는 큰 떨림이었더라

sentences.original_text: All the other soldiers in the Philistine army
This included the soldiers in the camp
and the groups who were attacking other towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다른 도시들을 공격하던 무리들도 포함되었습니다

sentences.original_text: because God had made them all very afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들을 모두 매우 두렵게 만드셨기 때문입니다
